item.title: Journal Archives
item.description:
When I was a kid in high school and college I loved the programming magazines of the time. I was just getting familiar with Unix systems, and hacking around on the campus AIX and Solaris systems. Somewhere my freshman year I discovered Linux and installed Slackware on a hard drive partition.

I came across this DVD archive of several programming languages from the time and I felt a need to preserve them here for posterity. Inside you can find:
